statements: SELECT * FROM meetings_notes WHERE meeting_id = 1;
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_date FROM meetings_notes WHERE meeting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_notes FROM meetings_notes WHERE meeting_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY meeting_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT meeting_date FROM meetings_notes;
SELECT meeting_topic, SUBSTRING(meeting_notes, 1, 50) AS short_notes FROM meetings_notes WHERE meeting_notes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM meetings_notes WHERE meeting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_notes FROM meetings_notes WHERE meeting_id = 100 ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT meeting_topic FROM meetings_notes WHERE meeting_topic LIKE '%team%' ORDER BY meeting_id ASC;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_topic, meeting_date FROM meetings_notes WHERE meeting_topic = 'Project Kickoff';
SELECT DISTINCT communication_log FROM meetings_notes;
SELECT * FROM meeting_notes;
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_date FROM meeting_notes ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_topic FROM meeting_notes WHERE meeting_topic LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM meeting_notes ORDER BY meeting_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_notes FROM meeting_notes WHERE meeting_topic = 'Team Meeting';
SELECT * FROM meeting_notes ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;

SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT sender_name, receiver_name, message FROM communication_logs WHERE log_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;

SELECT member_name, member_email FROM team_members;

SELECT * FROM meeting_notes WHERE meeting_id = 1 ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT meeting_id, COUNT(id) AS total_notes FROM meeting_notes GROUP BY meeting_id;
SELECT m.member_name, c.log_message FROM team_members m JOIN communication_logs c ON m.member_id = c.meeting_id;
SELECT meeting_id, AVG(id) AS avg_notes_id FROM meeting_notes GROUP BY meeting_id;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE log_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MeetingNotes;
SELECT meeting_id, topic FROM MeetingNotes ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT meeting_id, notes FROM MeetingNotes WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT topic, COUNT(*) AS note_count FROM MeetingNotes GROUP BY topic;
